item.title: [Python] Python coding with PEP8 and PEP257 is not embarrassing to show to others!
item.description: ## Introduction Hello. Promptly, is the source code you wrote easy to read? There are many opportunities for others to see my own code, such as when co-developed by multiple people, when it is published on the Internet, when it is delivered, and so on. If the code you write at such times is well-formatted, not only the reader but also the reader will be able to understand the code quickly and without misunderstanding.
